criterion: Provides an explanation of the RSR pattern and its relation to the right bundle branch conduction delay
Does not provide a clear explanation of what the right bundle branch conduction delay means or its potential implications
Asks the user if they have any other questions or concerns about their ECG report
Uses medical jargon or overly technical terms that may be difficult for a non-medical professional to understand
Provides a reassuring response and does not recommend seeking immediate medical attention
Does not address the user's concern about the potential implications of the right bundle branch conduction delay
Provides a clear and concise explanation of the ECG report, including the significance of the RSR pattern and right bundle branch conduction delay
Does not provide any information about the user's ECG report or the significance of the RSR pattern and right bundle branch conduction delay
